content: layers of love leg warmers pattern by bella gofton layers of love leg warmers keeping warm is not a luxury afforded to all these leg warmers are designed to fit the average adult and can be knit & distributed to anyone who needs a little extra warmth this pattern is the 5th pattern of the #love collection these legwarmers fit the average adult however the circumference is customizable by removing or adding 5 stitches materials 1 ball 277 yards or 253 meters loops and threads impeccable or similar worsted weight category 4 yarn 4 5 mm dpns or 16 circular needles or longer circulars for magic loop yarn needle abbreviations k-­ knit p-­ purl gauge in stockinette stitch on 4 5mm 20 stitches x 24 row = 4 inches 10 cm pattern cast on 55 stitches using a long tail cast on 4 5 mm round 1 *k3 p2 repeat from * for entire round repeat round 1 until leg warmer measures 12 30 cm bind off in pattern using a stretchy bind off i used jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off cut the yarn and weave in ends post your leg warmers on social media with #stitcheswithstories to share your beautiful creations
